wikimedia-copyright: Dii Goy fondawey ka bay ka tonton.
wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Nda war na barmawey ga yadda [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] ga, nda šikka kul šii, war  ga yadda ka war kanbuzaamaa dam [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] bande.
War ga yadda ka dobuɲaa wala interneti aderesu ga wasa Creative Commons duɲetiira se.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''[[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|kayandi wikiyaŋ kul ga]] na war IP aderesoo hode.'''

Hodeyan teekaa $1 ($2).
Daliloo kaŋ noondi ''$3''.

* Hodeyan šintinoo: $4
* Hodeyan benantaa: $5

War sohõda IP aderesoo ti $6.

Wa war tammaasawey wey kul dam hãayaney kaŋ war g'i tee ra. make.

Nda war ga tammahã kaŋ war n' ka hodandi dereyan ra, war ga hin ka duu tontoni bayray nda boŋfeeray [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|Tokore ferante kul šii]] adduɲɲaa-me alaada takaddaa ra.
Nd'a manti woo, hoderoo šennoo tee [[m:Steward requests/Global|korošiyan hãayan sanba Meta-Wiki ga]] ga.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''Tokore feršikaw foo wala tanayaŋ kaŋ war hãayanoo n'i ka goy ti [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].'''

$1 ($2) ka hodeyanoo tee.
Daliloo kaŋ noondi ti ''$3''.

* Hodeyan šintinoo: $4
* Hodeyan benantaa: $5

Tokore aderesu hodantaa ti $6.
War beene tammaasawey kul dam hãayaney kul kaŋ war g'i tee ra.

Nda war ga tammahã war n' ka hodandi dereyan ra, war ga hin ka duu bayray tontoni wala boŋfeeray [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|Tokore feerante kul šii]] adduɲɲaa-mee alaada takaddaa ra.
Nd'a manti woo, wa hoderoo šennoo tee [[m:Steward requests/Global|korošiyan hãayan sanba Meta-Wiki ga]] ga.
